flavorText: Some Krovikans find strength in the ears and eyes of their victims and wear such fetishes into battle.
name: Krovikan Fetish
originalText:
Enchant creature
When Krovikan Fetish comes into play, draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.

rulings.text: You do not get a card if the target becomes illegal and Krovikan Fetish doesn’t resolve. This is because it never successfully enters the battlefield.
If it is moved to a new creature by something that moves Auras, the controller of the Fetish does not get to draw another card.

text:
Enchant creature
When Krovikan Fetish enters the battlefield, draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
